about_the_game:
All events and characters are fictional. Any resemblance to reality is purely coincidental.

In the mire of days, where truth drowns,
Where falsehood reigns behind locked gates,
A soul lies wounded, lost in grief,
And justice lingers far away.

Yet a flicker of hope will break the dark,
A silhouette will rise at night,
With weapon clenched through lies and gloom,
To claim the debt that fate demands.

| STORY |

You are Dan. Just a janitor whose life spirals into hell after a series of misfortunes:

  • Fired — thrown out with a pitiful severance and an empty future.

  • Alone — an empty apartment near New York, where only an unfinished can of Bräpsi awaits.

  • Family conflicts — a father who comes to "help" but brings only bitter reproaches and hollow advice.

  • Betrayed by Louise — a single night with her ends in robbery, humiliation, and a gun pressed to your temple.

Now, you have a choice: crumble under the weight of failure — or pick up a weapon.

| GAME FEATURES |

  • A deep narrative — inspired by the bestseller Quiet Dan, the story offers not just action but reflections on betrayal and revenge. The deeper you go, the more reality blurs into nightmares. Are you a victim… or a monster?

  • Branching choices — your decisions shape the story, altering characters' fates and the game’s ending. Every choice has consequences.

  • A varied arsenal — from compact pistols to powerful assault rifles. Each weapon has its strengths and weaknesses, forcing you to think in combat.

  • Unique enemies and allies — from drifters to criminal syndicates, each with their own story and motivation.

  • A noir aesthetic — grainy visuals, harsh neon flashes, and a soundtrack that cuts like a blade to the skin.

  • Detailed locations — every setting is unique, filled with secrets and details that tell their own story.

name: DEN PAIN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8th Gen
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8th Gen
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 2060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: My name is Dan. I lost my job, my money, and my silver spoons.Betrayed, robbed, cast aside.But at night, the city whispers: it's time to take it back.Everything will be Quiet and Standard.
